Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillcrest Drive, south of the Dragon Tooth Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the Dragon Tooth Inn is to the north of here. The small path leads up past a small fountain into the reception area. There is a very nice bar and other more expensive items to be found in such a lavish establishment. It is always crawling with city guard patrols as well as their own security force. Oceanview Drive is to the west of here.
